response.overview: Fink, who is new to the city, visits a small open-air event. There he meets a group of wild young people. When the event is ended due to the imminent dream weather, everyone leavesâ€”except his new friends, who are bubbling with anticipation and persuade him to stay. Even though it's forbidden. The dream weather begins to materialize people's subconscious. What comes to the surface is uncertain.
response.title: Neonazur
